title: "Can AI Be Sexist?"
excerpt: "Santa Clara team identifies male “brilliance bias” in world’s top AI robowriter. Next up: Solving the problem. The three female students who approached Assistant Professor of Computer Science and Engineering Maya Ackerman last fall for help on their senior thesis had a wish list: identify and research a technical angle around gender bias that would have “real world impact."
